about_the_game:
Trapped in a haunted high school, Kasuga must uncover buried secrets to escape the terror-filled halls.

         

                             

Kasuga, a popular student, wakes up to find herself inexplicably trapped inside her school after dark. The eerie silence and shadowy corridors are far removed from the bustling, lively atmosphere she knows. Worse yet, her memory of how she ended up there is a blank slate.

Desperate to escape, Kasuga begins exploring the seemingly abandoned building, only to encounter chilling phenomena. Cryptic text messages flood her smartphone. Strange entities begin to manifest.

Piece by piece, Kasuga must uncover the truth about her school, her peers, and even herself. But beware: nothing is as it seems, and some secrets are better left buried.

                          

  • A Spine-Chilling Horror Adventure: Explore a haunted high school filled with eerie sights, cryptic clues, and unsettling twists that will keep you on edge.

  • Interactive Smartphone Gameplay: Use Kasuga's smartphone to log clues, capture photos, and receive unsettling messages as you unravel the mysteries surrounding her imprisonment.

  • Dynamic Perspective Switching: Experience the tension from every angle—switch seamlessly between 3rd and 1st person views to fully immerse yourself in the environment.

  • Anime-Style 3D Graphics: Dive into a world that combines stunning visuals with a deeply atmospheric setting, creating a perfect blend of beauty and dread.

Will you help Kasuga escape the nightmare... or will you succumb to it?

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content

name: High School Dirty Secrets

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3570K or similar
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 780 or similar
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4790 or similar
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 or similar
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: High School Dirty Secrets is a horror/puzzle adventure where Kasuga wakes up locked inside her high school with no memory of how she got there. As she searches for a way out, strange and unsettling events unfold, leading her to uncover dark secrets hidden within the school's walls.
